DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , double-blind placebo control study efficacy safety characterize peanut oral immunotherapy peanut allergic individual .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Desensitization Peanut Peanut-Allergic Children Adults Using Characterized Peanut Allergen OIT
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind placebo control study efficacy safety characterize peanut OIT peanut allergic individual . All eligible subject receive escalate dose CPNA placebo . Approximately 50 subject randomize 1:1 peanut OIT placebo .
DOC.criteria: Age 4 26 year Clinical history allergy peanut peanut contain food Serum IgE peanut > 0.35 kU/L ( determined UniCAP within past 12 month ) and/or SPT peanut > 3 mm compare control Experience doselimiting symptom 100mg dose peanut protein ( measure 200 mg peanut flour ) abbreviate screen OFC conduct via PRACTALL guideline Use birth control females child bear potential History Cardiovascular disease History frequent repeat , severe lifethreatening episode anaphylactic shock History chronic disease History eosinophilic gastrointestinal disease Severe asthma Mild moderate asthma uncontrolled Use omalizumab within past 6 month current use nontraditional form allergen immunotherapy Use betablockers ( oral ) , angiotensinconverting enzyme ( ACE ) Pregnancy , lactation Having place residence another study subject Participation interventional clinical trial 30 day prior randomization
